resources.string: Seven Shuffle is a game. The goal is to guess as many anagrams as possible, given a set of characters. \n An anagram is a word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of a different word or phrase, typically using all the original letters exactly once.
Heads up! Changing the theme will end any game that’s currently playing. Make sure to finish your game first.
